verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אַל־ [T'al- תַּשְׁחֵ֗ת <S%H516><s%> tash-Chet, Altaschith לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid of David מִכְתָּֽם׃ <S%H4387><s%> mich-Tam. Michtam הַֽאֻמְנָ֗ם <S%H552><s%> ha-'um-Nam, Do ye indeed אֵ֣לֶם <S%H482><s%> 'E-lem congregation צֶ֭דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek righteousness תְּדַבֵּר֑וּן <S%H1696><s%> te-dab-be-Run; speak מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <S%H4339><s%> mei-sha-Rim uprightly תִּ֝שְׁפְּט֗וּ <S%H8199><s%> tish-pe-Tu, avenge בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei O ye sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. man

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- No בְּלֵב֮ <S%H3820><s%> be-Lev Yea in heart עוֹלֹ֪ת <S%H5766><s%> o-Lot wickedness תִּפְעָ֫ל֥וּן <S%H6466><s%> tif-'A-Lun ye work בָּאָ֡רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz in the earth חֲמַ֥ס <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas the violence יְ֝דֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Chem, of your hands תְּפַלֵּֽסֽוּן׃ <S%H6424><s%> te-fal-Le-Sun. ye weigh

זֹ֣רוּ <S%H2114><s%> Zo-ru are estranged רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im The wicked מֵרָ֑חֶם <S%H7358><s%> me-Ra-chem; from the womb תָּע֥וּ <S%H8582><s%> ta-'U they go astray מִ֝בֶּ֗טֶן <S%H990><s%> mib-Be-ten, as soon as they be born דֹּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1696><s%> doe-Rei speaking כָזָֽב׃ <S%H3577><s%> cha-Zav. lies

חֲמַת־ <S%H2534><s%> cha-mat- Their poison לָ֗מוֹ la-mo, כִּדְמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> kid-Mut [is] like חֲמַת־ <S%H2534><s%> cha-mat- the poison נָחָ֑שׁ <S%H5175><s%> na-Chash; of a serpent כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- Like פֶ֥תֶן <S%H6620><s%> Fe-ten adder חֵ֝רֵ֗שׁ <S%H2795><s%> che-Resh, [they are] like the deaf יַאְטֵ֥ם <S%H331><s%> ya'-Tem [that] stoppeth אָזְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H241><s%> a-ze-No. her ear

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher So לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יִ֭שְׁמַע <S%H8085><s%> Yish-ma' Which will not hearken לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> le-Kol to the voice מְלַחֲשִׁ֑ים <S%H3907><s%> me-la-cha-Shim; of charmers חוֹבֵ֖ר <S%H2266><s%> cho-Ver caster חֲבָרִ֣ים <S%H2267><s%> cha-va-Rim of spells מְחֻכָּֽם׃ <S%H2449><s%> me-chuk-Kam. never so wisely

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, O God הֲרָס־ <S%H2040><s%> ha-ros- Break שִׁנֵּ֥ימוֹ <S%H8127><s%> shin-Nei-mov their teeth בְּפִ֑ימוֹ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi-mov; in their mouth מַלְתְּע֥וֹת <S%H4459><s%> mal-te-'ot the great teeth כְּ֝פִירִ֗ים <S%H3715><s%> ke-fi-Rim, of the young lions נְתֹ֣ץ׀ <S%H5422><s%> ne-Totz break out יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. O LORD

יִמָּאֲס֣וּ <S%H3988><s%> yim-ma-'a-Su Let them melt away כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> che-mov- like מַ֭יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim as waters יִתְהַלְּכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> yit-hal-le-chu- [which] run continually לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; יִדְרֹ֥ךְ <S%H1869><s%> yid-Roch [when] he bendeth; חִצֹּו chitz-tzov כחִ֝צָּ֗יו <S%H2671><s%> chitz-Tzav, archer קכְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> ke-Mo like יִתְמֹלָֽלוּ׃ <S%H4135><s%> yit-mo-La-lu. let them be as cut in pieces

כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> ke-Mo as שַׁ֭בְּלוּל <S%H7642><s%> be-lul As a snail תֶּ֣מֶס <S%H8557><s%> Te-mes [which] melteth יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ya-ha-Loch; let [every one of them] pass away נֵ֥פֶל <S%H5309><s%> Ne-fel [like] the untimely birth אֵ֝֗שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet, of a woman בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- never חָ֥זוּ <S%H2372><s%> Cha-zu [that] they may not see שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> Sha-mesh. the sun

בְּטֶ֤רֶם <S%H2962><s%> be-Te-rem Before יָבִ֣ינוּ <S%H995><s%> ya-Vi-nu can feel סִּֽירֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5518><s%> si-ro-tei-Chem Before your pots אָטָ֑ד <S%H329><s%> 'a-Tad; the thorns כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- alike חַ֥י <S%H2416><s%> chai both living כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- alike חָ֝ר֗וֹן <S%H2740><s%> cha-Ron, and in [his] wrath יִשְׂעָרֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H8175><s%> yis-'a-Ren-nu. he shall take them away as with a whirlwind

יִשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach shall rejoice צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-dik The righteous כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when חָזָ֣ה <S%H2372><s%> cha-Zah when he seeth נָקָ֑ם <S%H5359><s%> na-Kam; the vengeance פְּעָמָ֥יו <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mav his feet יִ֝רְחַ֗ץ <S%H7364><s%> yir-Chatz, he shall wash בְּדַ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> be-Dam in the blood הָרָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> ha-ra-Sha'. of the wicked

וְיֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> ve-yo-Mar shall say אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom So that a man אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- Surely פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> pe-Ri Verily [there is] a reward לַצַּדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> latz-tzad-Dik; for the righteous אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Surely יֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- verily he is אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, a God שֹׁפְטִ֥ים <S%H8199><s%> sho-fe-Tim that judgeth בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the earth
